activateAccount.title: Activate payments
activateAccount.description: Complete your business profile to start accepting payments from customers.
activateAccount.businessTypeDescription: Choose your location and business type to get started.
activateAccount.personalDetailsDescription: Yabetoo collects this information to verify your identity.
activateAccount.tellUsAboutBusinessDescription: Yabetoo collects this information to better understand and serve your business.
activateAccount.payoutMethodDescription: A payout is the transfer of funds from Yabetoo to your mobile money account.
activateAccount.document: Upload your business registration documents to verify your business.
activateAccount.individualEntrepreneurDescription: Choose this option if you are a sole proprietor or part of the micro-entrepreneur/auto-entrepreneur regime. A sole proprietorship, unlike a company, does not create a separate legal entity. It is  linked to your personal identity and means that you have not drawn up articles of association or capital stock.
activateAccount.companyDescription: Choose this option if you have created or are part of a legally distinct corporate entity (legal person) separate from the creator or founding associates, and if the legal form corresponds to one of those listed here (excluding Sole Proprietorship).
activateAccount.associationDescription: You can consult the different types of associations on the government website.
activateAccount.productDescriptionDetails: Provide a 1-2 sentence description. Make sure to note when you typically charge your customers (i.e. during checkout or 3 days later). This helps us better understand your business.
activateAccount.statementDescriptorDetails: Your statement descriptor shows up on your customers' bank or credit card statements. It should be 5-22 characters
activateAccount.publicDetailsDescription: This information may be visible in payment statements, invoices, and receipts.
activateAccount.showCustomerSupportPhoneNumber: Show phone number on invoices and receipts
activateAccount.showCustomerPhoneNumberDetails: This hides your customer support number on invoices and receipts. Your customer support number will still be shown on customer bank and credit card statements.
activateAccount.businessRegistrationDocuments: Please fill in the business registration documents
activateAccount.warningFraudAlert: Important: Certify the authenticity of the documents
activateAccount.warningFraudAlertDescription: By submitting your documents, you certify they authenticity, otherwise, your account may be suspended and legal action may be taken.

register.title: Create your Yabetoo account
register.description: Stay informed about developments in your professional world
register.terms: By registering, you agree to Yabetoo's Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
register.securityTipsDescription: Check the URL to ensure you're signing up at app.yabetoo.com. Phishing attacks often use a fake website to access your login information. For example, attackers might use a misspelled version of the URL.
register.agreeTerms: By signing up, you agree to our {termsAndConditions} and {privacyPolicy}.
register.accountCreatedSuccess: Your account has been created successfully. Please check your email to activate your account.
register.accountCreationError: An error occurred while creating your account.

payment.balanceDescription: Your balance is the amount of money you have available to spend or withdraw.
payment.withdrawDescription: Transfer your balance to your mobile money account.

navigation.testMessage: You are currently in test mode. Test mode allows you to test your integration without processing real payments. To start processing real payments, switch to live mode.

shop.shopDescription: Add a new shop to manage products and customers
shop.shopError: An error occurred while creating the shop
shop.shopCountryNotFoundError: Country not found, please contact support

product.productDetailsDescription: Add product details to help customers understand what you're selling.
product.name: Name
product.nameHelpText: Give your product a short and clear name. characters is the recommended length for search engines.
product.descriptionHelpText: Give your product a short and clear description. 120-160 characters is the recommended length for search engines.
product.priceDetails: Add pricing details to help customers understand the cost of your product.
product.pricePlaceholder: Enter the price of your product
product.statusHelpText: Set the status of your product. by default, it is set to draft and will not be visible to the public. You need to set it to published to make it visible.
product.variantStatusHelpText: Set the status of your variant. by default, it is enable and will be visible to the public.

login.title: Sign in to your account
login.description: Stay informed about developments in your professional world
login.termsAgreement: By submitting this form, you agree to our
login.securityTip: Check the URL to make sure you're signing into app.yabetoopay.com. Phishing attacks often use a fake website to access your login information. For example, attackers might use a misspelled version of the URL.
login.forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your username to receive a password reset link
login.passwordResetError: An error occurred while resetting your password. Please try again.
login.passwordResetLinkSent: A password reset email has been sent to your email address.
login.passwordResetSuccess: Your password has been successfully reset. You can now log in.

paymentLink.title: Payment Link
paymentLink.activateLinkDescription: Activate the link to start receiving payments.
paymentLink.customerChooseWhatToPay: Choose what you want to pay
paymentLink.name: Title
paymentLink.productDetailsDescription: Add product details to help customers understand what you're selling.
paymentLink.priceDetails: Add pricing details to help customers understand the cost of your product.

organization.descriptionPlaceholder: Enter a brief description of your organization
organization.accountNameQuestion: What would you like to name your account?
organization.nameMinLength: Organization name must be at least 2 characters
organization.nameMaxLength: Organization name must be less than 50 characters
organization.descriptionMaxLength: Description must be less than 500 characters
organization.accountNameMinLength: Account name must be at least 2 characters
organization.accountNameMaxLength: Account name must be less than 50 characters
organization.linkDescription: Create a new organization and link your existing accounts to it
organization.accountsToLink: These accounts will be linked to your new organization
organization.noAccountsDescription: You need to create an account first before creating an organization
organization.transferDescription: The following accounts will be transferred to this organization:
organization.transferExplanation: We noticed you have accounts that are not linked to any organization. To ensure proper functionality and access to all features, these accounts need to be associated with an organization. By transferring them to this organization, you'll be able to manage them effectively and access all available features.

account.title: Account Setup
account.description: Let's set up your account for this organization
account.transferDescription: The following accounts will be transferred to this organization:
account.transferExplanation: We noticed you have accounts that are not linked to any organization. To ensure proper functionality and access to all features, these accounts need to be associated with an organization. By transferring them to this organization, you'll be able to manage them effectively and access all available features.
account.createDescription: Create a new account for this organization
